attributes.action: Request that an early early general election.
attributes.additional_details: We would like a vote of no confidence in the current cabinet to bring about an early election.
attributes.background: The Conservative party came into power due to the country having severe doubts in the ability of the labour leader, Ed Miliband to sincerely represent the opposition party. Since re-election, the Conservative party has shown a complete lack of concern for the more disadvantaged of its electorate.
